dict.acceptation: 得名次；名列前茅；[美国英语][赛马]得第二名；准确把…推到预定地点；

sent.orig: Moulin Rouge is a place of lust, a place of money, a place of devil.
sent.trans: 红磨坊是一个充斥着铜臭、望和邪恶的地方。

sent.orig: Favorite Place: Asas's food and the place is below 25 degree Celsius,'s my favorites place!
sent.trans: 最喜欢的地方：只要那个地方有好吃的东西还有气温低于25度，我就会喜欢！

sent.orig: A place of residence includes a place of permanent residency and a place of habitual residence.
sent.trans: 居住地包括户籍所在地、经常居住地。

sent.orig: A pleasant place to place a plaice is a place ato be placed.
sent.trans: 放置鲽的最好地方是鲽愿意被放置的地方。

sent.orig: Working Group to work in place, services are in place, the slightest error can occur.
sent.trans: 工作组要工作到位、服务到位，不能发生丝毫差错。
